item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #453】SRE 周刊第 #453 期
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, FireHydrant: Why migrate from PagerDuty? Empower team-level ownership, reduce costs, decouple alerts from incidents, automate incidents end-to-end…to name a few. Join the growing list of companies that have made the switch.
